title: I reset an Old work phone and now I can't get past the Google account screen.
content: I work for a major telecommunication company as an install tech for fiber. I received two pixel 3 phones from work already factory reset presumably just needing a new sim card. But when I attempt to start the setup process I can't get passed the initial Google account recovery stage. Does anyone know of any way to bypass or remove this requirement? I was looking forward to upgrading but the struggle has me rethinking my choice of phone.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
